data.title: Power and Powerlessness in Performance
data.meta_description: Performance Philosophy is an emerging interdisciplinary field of thought, creative practice and scholarship. The international, peer-reviewed, open access journal publishes articles that interrogate what this field might be and what might be possible within it.
